name: XRPKit
summary: Swift SDK for interacting with XRP Ledger
description: XRPKit is a Swift SDK built for interacting with the XRP Ledger.  XRPKit supports offline wallet creation, offline transaction creation/signing, and submitting transactions to the XRP ledger.  XRPKit supports both the secp256k1 and ed25519 algorithms.  XRPKit is available on iOS, macOS and Linux (SPM)
